words.tran_cn: 安静的，平静的；安宁的；稳定的
镇定剂；使镇定的人或物

trans.tran_cn: 镇静剂，止痛药，增稳装置
trans.tran_en: A tranquilizer is a drug that makes people feel calmer or less anxious. Tranquilizers are sometimes used to make people or animals become sleepy or unconscious.
